message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this valuable item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10,000. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you meet me halfway?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but I'm not willing to go as low as $8,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'll need to get a bit closer to my target price. I'm offering you the product for $9,500. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but $9,500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $9,000, but that's as high as I can go. Can you consider that?

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $9,000. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I'll need to get closer to my target price. I'm offering you the product for $9,750. What do you think?
I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too far apart, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I can only go up to $9,250. That's my final offer. Can you consider that?

I understand that we're getting close to the end of our negotiation, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for $9,250. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I'll need to get closer to my target price. I'm offering you the product for $9,800. This is my final offer. What do you think?
